title: Rising input cost shifts SRAS, not AD

content.question: An increase in the price of a key input will cause the aggregate demand curve and the short-run aggregate supply curve to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve Shift to the right Shift to the right
Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve Shift to the left Shift to the left
Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve Shift to the left No change
Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve No change Shift to the left
Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve No change Shift to the right

content.answer: Aggregate Demand Curve Aggregate Supply Curve No change Shift to the left

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
